name: ZipMinis Freelance Writing
tag_list: freelance-writing, copy-writing, copy-editing, ebooks, white-papers, blog-articles, webpages, presentations, desktop-publishing, publishing, writing-instruction, writing-seminars, writing-workshops, writing-keynote, technical-writing, business-writing, pr
overview:
ZipMinis Freelance Writing specializes in SEO content and professional documents including blog posts, web pages, copy writing, desktop publishing, presentations, custom emails, white papers, and ebooks.

Darin L. Hammond owns and writes for the organization which he founded on July 7, 2012 in Rexburg, Idaho. He launched the ZipMinis website which focuses on social media, technology, and writing.

The collection of blogs centers on the psychology that links the three topics, exploring connections that inform the readers about the subjects as they connect with the human brain and society. ZipMinis offers writing and social media advice grounded in research and science.

The services ZipMinis Freelance Writing provides are informed by the knowledge in the blog articles. In addition, Darin L. Hammond holds an MA in English and Writing and is currently finishing work on a PhD in English. He studied advanced writing, rhetoric and communication, and editing at Idaho State University. Darin uses this experience to write professional copy.

The organization also benefits from Darin’s 11 years teaching university level advanced, professional, business, and technical writing. ZipMinis Freelance Writing offers freelance tutoring, teaching, keynote speaking, seminars, and workshops based upon this teaching experience. He travels across the United States teaching, and currently teaches writing at Idaho State University as well.

Although headquartered in Rexburg, Idaho, ZipMinis operates on a national scale, working mostly through web services.
